Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Three (3) state-of-the-art distribution/fulfillment facilities totaling ±1,805,800 SF
Dock high and grade level doors

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the North Las Vegas Submarket with access via Speedway Interchange and Hollywood Blvd. Future access from I-15 via Las Vegas Blvd.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
New State-Of-The-Art Distribution/Fulfillment Facilities Totaling Up to ±2,000,000 SF

Estimated Delivery of Phase I - 2023!

PHASE I

Three (3) state-of-the-art distribution/fulfillment facilities totaling ±1,805,800 SF

Building 1:     ±424,000 SF
Building 2:     ±595,800 SF
Building 3:     ±786,000 SF
Divisible to ±150,000 SF
Cross dock configurations
Minimum clear height 36’ - 40’
Dock high and grade level doors
ESFR Sprinkler System
Abundant trailer parking


PHASE II & PHASE III
Three (3) state-of-the-art logistics facilities totaling ±2,796,800 SF
Build to Suit opportunities available

*Download brochure for more details

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New State-Of-The-Art Distribution/Fulfillment Facilities Totaling Up to ±2,000,000 SF

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Building 4: ±656,267 SF cross dock facility with divisibility to ±164,000 SF. Office BTS, 40’ clear height, 108 dock doors, 4 grade level doors, ESFR sprinkler system, R-30 roof batt insulation, ample auto & trailer parking, concrete truck court, potential for secured truck court.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located in the heart of the Speedway Area which has become the epicenter of e-commerce/logistics.
• Immediate access to the I-15 via Tropical Pkwy. interchange
• City of North Las Vegas Jurisdiction
• M-2 zoning

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: State-of-the-art distribution facility breaking ground Q4 2021. Building 4: ±656,267 SF cross dock facility with divisibility to ±164,000 SF. Office BTS, 40’ clear height, 108 dock doors, 4 grade level doors, ESFR sprinkler system, R-30 roof batt insulation, ample auto & trailer parking, concrete truck court, potential for secured truck court.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Building 2 consists of ±196,652 total SF. Office is BTS. 37' clear height. 32 dock high doors. 1 grade level door. ±56'x±60' column spacing. ESFR sprinkler system. Rear loading.

Building 4 consists of ±400,740 total SF. Office is BTS. 36' clear height. 61 dock high doors. 2 grade level doors. ±56'x±60 column spacing. ESFR sprinkler system. Rear loading configuration. 354 auto parking stalls. 79 trailer parking stalls.

Building 5 consists of ±200,000 total SF. Office is BTS. 36' clear height. 30 dock high doors. 1 grade level door. ±56'x±60 column spacing. ESFR sprinkler system. Rear loading configuration. 150 auto parking stalls. 43 trailer parking stalls.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±196,652 SF remaining state-of-the-art distribution/ fulfillment facility

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Conveniently located in the heart of the North Las Vegas submarket with easy access to I-15 via Craig Road and Lamb Boulevard Interchanges. Close to an abundance of restaurants, shopping venues, and industrial owner/users and manufacturing/distribution facilities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
PHASE I RECENTLY COMPLETED | PHASE II UNDER CONSTRUCTION! Golden Triangle Logistics Center features State of the Art, Class A industrial facilities.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: ±33,787 SF Freestanding Industrial Building on ±1.62 Acres
Two (2) Dock-Hi Loading Doors | Three (3) Grade-Level loading doors

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 3955 N. Pecos Road is located in the High-Demand North Las Vegas Submarket right off the I-15 Freeway & Craig Road.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 3955 N. Pecos Road is a ±33,787 SF Freestanding Industrial Building on ±1.62 Acres featuring ±8,414 SF Office Space with seven (7) Private Offices, Reception, Open Office, Break Room, two (2) Multi-Stall Restrooms, and ±25,373 SF Warehouse with ±24' Clear Height, three (3) Grade-Level loading doors, two (2) Dock-Hi Loading Doors, 800 amps, 277/480 volt, 3-Phase Power, ESFR Sprinklers and a paved, fenced yard, Zoned M-2.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ±33,787 SF Freestanding Industrial Building w/ Fenced Yard

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: This unit consists of ±208,658 total SF. Office BTS. 36' clear height. 46 (9'x10') dock high doors. 4 (12'x14') grade level doors. ±60'x±56' column spacing. 7" reinforced concrete flooring. R-19 roof insulation.  ESFR sprinkler system. Rear loaded. Trailer parking.

Building 4 consists of ±488,100 total SF. Office BTS. 36' clear height. 105 (9'x10') dock high doors. 4 (12'x14') grade level doors. ±50'x±56' column spacing. 7" reinforced concrete flooring. R-30 roof insulation.  ESFR sprinkler system. Cross dock loading. 305 auto parking stalls and 134 trailer parking stalls.

Building 6 consists of ±243,267 total SF, with divisibility to ±34,320 SF. Office BTS. 32' clear height. 60 (9'x10') dock high doors. 6 (12'x14') grade level doors. ±60'x±52' column spacing. 7" reinforced concrete flooring. R-30 roof insulation.  ESFR sprinkler system. Rear loaded. 253 auto parking stalls. 81 trailer parking stalls.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Trailer stall parking available at all facilities

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Conveniently located in the heart of the North Las Vegas submarket, this project provides excellent connectivity to the I-15 via Craig Road and Cheyenne Avenue Interchanges.
                                          ±1.55 to Craig Rd. Interchange
                                          ±1.56 miles to Cheyenne Ave. Interchange

Close proximity to an abundance of amenities located on the Craig Rd. thoroughfare. City of North Las Vegas Jurisdiction. Zoning: M1.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Silver State Commerce Center is a state-of-the-art master planned industrial project featuring Class A facilities that can accommodate ±55,250 SF up to ±659,164 SF Build to Suit. The project will be delivered in two (2) phases.  

PHASE I:
• One (1) state-of-the-art logistics facility totaling ±208,658 SF available
• Rear loading configuration
• Office BTS
• 36’ minimum clear height
• ESFR Sprinkler System
• Trailer stall parking available at all facilities


PHASE II:
• Two (2) state-of-the-art logistics facilities totaling ±731,367 SF
• Rear loading and cross dock configuration
• Build to Suit opportunities
